survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Meal Kit Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers of subscription-based meal kit services to understand satisfaction levels, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How long have you been using a subscription-based meal kit service?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How long have you been using a subscription-based meal kit service?

questions.question_text: Which of the following meal kit services do you currently subscribe to? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format to allow multiple selections.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an 'Other' option with a text field for specification.

script.question_text: Which of the following meal kit services do you currently subscribe to? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the variety of meal options offered by your meal kit service? (1 = Not satisfied at all, 5 = Extremely satisfied)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for this question to measure satisfaction levels effectively.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE). Display the scale horizontally for better readability.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the variety of meal options offered by your meal kit service? (1 = Not satisfied at all, 5 = Extremely satisfied)

questions.question_text: What do you like most about your meal kit service?
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question allows respondents to provide detailed feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for ample input.

script.question_text: What do you like most about your meal kit service?

questions.question_text: Have you ever experienced issues with the delivery of your meal kit?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple yes/no radio button for this question.

script.question_text: Have you ever experienced issues with the delivery of your meal kit?

questions.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, please describe the issue you encountered with the delivery.
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if Q5 is answered with 'Yes'
questions.client_notes: This follow-up question is conditional and should only appear if the respondent indicated a delivery issue.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open text (OPEN_TEXT). Apply routing logic to show this question only if Q5 is 'Yes'.

script.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, please describe the issue you encountered with the delivery.
script.routing_logic: Appears only if Q5 is answered with 'Yes'

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your meal kit service to a friend or family member? (1 = Not likely at all, 10 = Extremely likely)
questions.client_notes: Use a 10-point scale for this Net Promoter Score (NPS) question to gauge recommendation likelihood.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE). Display the scale horizontally for better readability.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your meal kit service to a friend or family member? (1 = Not likely at all, 10 = Extremely likely)
